name: Cursed Crypts
description:
Cursed Crypts is a Tower Defence game created for Kenney Jam 2020.

Heros and Adventures are attacking our sacred crypt! Build some defences to stop their advance and try to last as long as possible against their onslaught.

As a guardian of the crypt, leverage your natural necromancy powers to place curses on the tower, increasing their power and attack range.
